arts.ttl: Milan 0-1 Arsenal: Player Ratings As Gunners Earn Victory in Pre-Season Opener
arts.sum: Saka was particularly sharp down the right-hand side but Arsenal struggled to work debutant goalkeeper Pietro Terracciano on too many occasions. Mikel Merino, Arsenal’s surprise goalscoring machine last season, almost grabbed their second, with Milan goalkeeper Lorenzo Torriani producing an excellent save to parry the Spaniard’s header.
